definition: to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: After the US, no other country has so many people in this list.
sentences.chinese: 除了美國以外，沒有其它國家有如此多的富豪入圍。

sentences.english: Amelia Turner. Shortlisted for the Booker Prize last year.
sentences.chinese: 阿米莉亞特納，去年入圍布克獎。

sentences.english: The short-listed candidates will run off for presidency on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 入圍的總統候選人將在週一進行最後的決選。

sentences.english: The forty finalists were honored in Washington last week.
sentences.chinese: 上週，40名入圍決賽者在華盛頓獲得表彰。

sentences.english: Will it have any impact on the final selection of 22 players, who will play in Mundial?
sentences.chinese: 這會對最後入圍世界盃的球員名單產生什麼影響麼？

sentences.english: The United States will soon gain company as a great power.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個越級大國，美國不久將會有新的夥伴入圍。

sentences.english: Responses to "Aunty Lucy Not Worthy of a Best Host Nomination?"
sentences.chinese: 安蒂露西不配入圍紅星‘最佳綜藝主持人’？

sentences.english: It's the same as the first time I'm nominated in GMA .
sentences.chinese: 那和我第一次入圍金曲獎時一樣嘛。

sentences.english: And the finalists will be known on 10/17.
sentences.chinese: 至於真正入圍名單則將在十月十七日公佈。

sentences.english: The Semi-Finalists will be informed through email or letter.
sentences.chinese: 主辦當局將以書信或電郵方式通知進入圍者。

sentences.english: She says the forty finalists represented excellence across many areas of science.
sentences.chinese: 她說，這40名入圍者代表着衆多科學領域的優勝者。

sentences.english: Award nominees were chosen by people from all areas of the entertainment industry.
sentences.chinese: 入圍者是由娛樂界各領域中的人所遴選出來。

sentences.english: Incidentally, this one was a CLIO Finalist.
sentences.chinese: 順便說一下，這是一個CLIO入圍。

sentences.english: So what were the key questions the judges had in mind when assessing the finalists?
sentences.chinese: 因此當評估入圍者時什麼是裁判心目中的關鍵問題？

sentences.english: American universities took all 5 top places and have 72 entries in the top 200.
sentences.chinese: 美國一共有72所高校入圍200強，彰顯霸主地位。

definition: to be chosen/to be elected as
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to compete/to take part in a competition
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
